summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Public Ticket Submission System including master data APIs, vehicle categories/models, issue suggestions, payment flow (Razorpay mock), and ticket tracking. All features working correctly.

tests: Master data seeding via /api/master-data/seed
Vehicle categories API (5 categories: 2W_EV, 3W_EV, 4W_EV, COMM_EV, LEV)
Vehicle models API with OEM grouping (21 models from Indian EV OEMs)
Issue suggestions API (18 predefined EV issues)
Service charges API (₹299 visit + ₹199 diagnostic)
Public form at /submit-ticket loads correctly
Customer Type selection (Individual vs Business/OEM/Fleet)
Business fields (Business Name, GST) appear for Business customers
Vehicle Category dropdown fetches from master data
Vehicle Model dropdown filters by selected category
Issue suggestions appear when typing in Issue Title field
Individual + OnSite shows ₹299 visit fee + ₹199 optional diagnostic
Payment button shows correct total (₹498)
Mock payment flow completes successfully
Success page shows ticket ID and tracking URL
Track Ticket page at /track-ticket loads correctly
Lookup by Ticket ID tab works
Lookup by Phone/Email tab works
Ticket details displayed with access token
Security: Access without token returns 403
Admin login successful
NewTicket form at /tickets/new uses unified master data
Vehicle Category dropdown shows all 5 categories
Customer Type dropdown available

seed_data_creation: Used /api/master-data/seed to seed vehicle categories, models, and issue suggestions

mocked_integrations.razorpay: Razorpay payments in MOCK mode - payments succeed without real Razorpay keys

context_for_next_testing_agent: Public ticket submission system fully tested. Master data includes 5 vehicle categories (2W_EV, 3W_EV, 4W_EV, COMM_EV, LEV), 21 vehicle models from popular Indian EV OEMs (Ola, Ather, TVS, Tata, MG, etc.), and 18 predefined EV issue suggestions. Payment flow works in mock mode. Track ticket page supports lookup by ticket ID or phone/email.
